bill_title: make an appropriation to the Board of Regents for the implementation of a nurse anesthesia program and to declare an emergency.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to make an appropriation to the Board of Regents for the implementation of a nurse anesthesia program and to declare an emergency. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. There is hereby appropriated from the general fund the sum of $2,500,000 to the Board of Regents, for purposes of establishing a nurse anesthesia program at the University of South Dakota by creating and filling up to six-and-one-half full-time-equivalent positions while providing the positions with the necessary equipment and supplies to support the program. Section 2. The executive director of the Board of Regents shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized by this Act. Section 3. Any amounts appropriated in this Act not lawfully expended or obligated by June 30, 2026, shall revert in accordance with the procedures prescribed in chapter 4-8. Section 4. Whereas, this Act is necessary for the support of the state government and its existing public institutions, an emergency is hereby declared to exist, and this Act shall be in full force and effect from and after its passage and approval.
